author: Lon.TV
description:
Sign up for a Plex Pass: http://lon.tv/plexpass (compensated affiliate link) See my previous subtitles videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvhjAAuPk54Nwl-gPVIeLlE - Plex recently added an auto-sync feature to their subtitle system to align subtitles that tend to "drift" over time. We'll look at that and I'll also demo a way you can make your own subtitles automatically with on-device AI. See more Plex: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvqJPAmMooCKOHieLdi3I7o and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

Plex Auto-Sync Support Page: https://support.plex.tv/articles/auto-sync-subtitles/

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:57 - Manual Subtitle Time Adjustments
02:19 - Auto Sync Subtitles
04:15 - Auto-sync setup
06:36 - Analyizing media for auto-sync
07:05 - Enabling auto-sync on playback
09:01 - Generating Subtitles with Vibe - Free On Device AI Transcription

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

Subscribe to my email lists! 
Weekly Breakdown of Posted Videos:  - https:/
title: More Plex Subtitles! Auto-Sync, Free On-Device AI Subs, and Manual Timing Offsets
